verses.text: Gather yourselves \w together|strong="H7197"\w*, yea, gather \w together|strong="H7197"\w*, O \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* not \w desired|strong="H3700"\w*;\f + \fr 2.1 \ft not…: or, not desirous\f*

Before the \w decree|strong="H2706"\w* bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, \add before\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* as the \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w*, \w before|strong="H3808"\w* the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon you, before the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon you.

\w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all ye \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, which have \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* his \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w meekness|strong="H6038"\w*: it may \w be|strong="H0194"\w* ye shall be \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.

¶ For \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* shall be \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*, and \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*: they shall drive \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* at the noon \w day|strong="H6672"\w*, and \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* shall be rooted \w up|strong="H6131"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w coast|strong="H2256"\w*, the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*! the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* against you; O \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, I will even \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* thee, that there shall be no \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.

And the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w coast|strong="H2256"\w* shall be \w dwellings|strong="H5116"\w* \add and\add* \w cottages|strong="H3741"\w* for \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and \w folds|strong="H1448"\w* for \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

And the \w coast|strong="H2256"\w* shall be for the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; they shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* thereupon: in the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w* shall they lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* them, and turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* their \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft for the \+nd LORD\+nd*: or, when, etc\f*

¶ I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w revilings|strong="H1421"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, whereby they have \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \add themselves\add* against their \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

Therefore \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Surely \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be as \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* as \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, \add even\add* the \w breeding|strong="H4476"\w* of \w nettles|strong="H2738"\w*, and \w saltpits|strong="H4379"\w*, and a \w perpetual|strong="H5704"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*: the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* them, and the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of my \w people|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* them.

This shall they have for their \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*, because they have \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* and \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \add themselves\add* against the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add will be\add* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* unto them: for he will \w famish|strong="H7329"\w* all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and \add men\add* shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* him, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft famish: Heb. make lean\f*
¶ Ye \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* also, \w ye|strong="H1992"\w* \add shall be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And he will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*; and will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, \add and\add* \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* like a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* shall lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her, all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: both the \w cormorant|strong="H6893"\w* and the \w bittern|strong="H7090"\w* shall \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* in the upper \w lintels|strong="H3730"\w* of it; \add their\add* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shall \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* in the \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*; \w desolation|strong="H2721"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w thresholds|strong="H5592"\w*: for he shall \w uncover|strong="H6168"\w* the cedar \w work|strong="H0731"\w*.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft cormorant: or, pelican\f*\f + \fr 2.14 \ft upper…: or, knops, or, chapiters\f*\f + \fr 2.14 \ft for…: or, when he hath uncovered\f*

This \add is\add* the \w rejoicing|strong="H5947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w carelessly|strong="H0983"\w*, that \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in her \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, I \add am\add*, and \add there is\add* none \w beside|strong="H0657"\w* me: how is she become a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, a place for \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* to lie down \w in|strong="H4769"\w*! every one that passeth \w by|strong="H5674"\w* her shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w*, \add and\add* \w wag|strong="H5128"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
